    #include<iostream>
    #include<algorithm>
    #include<cmath>
    #include<stdio.h>
    #include<string.h>
    #include<string>
    using namespace std;
    typedef unsigned long long int ull;
    int main()
    {
    ull t,i,count,j,k;
    string a,b;
    cin>>t;
    for(i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
      cin>>a;
      cout<<strlen(a.c_str())<<endl;
    }
    }
